channel.title: ANALYSIS on ALARAN IBRAHIM

item.title: PROJECT 1 (time-series):PREDICTING UNEMPLOYMENT RATE IN OSUN STATE
item.description: Freedom park, Osogbo (2020) This project is aim at solving problems & getting insights indigenous to my country Nigeria, Osun state to be precise. I initially used a linear regression model, but since I am now with more skills, I have choosen to use FbProphet model(Time_series_analysis) Although, there is a challenge of a reliable central data in Nigeria, I was able to scrap data from opendataforafrica.org using pandas library.
